title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 609.1 - Cost limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 609.1 - Cost limitations

State Regulations

Expenditures in excess of permitted rates for services, supplies, assistance, care of other items of cost and costs greater than those
necessary for the proper administration of public assistance and care or other
activities, are not subject to reimbursement by the department. Rates will be
established in accordance with the provisions of law where applicable and must
be consistent with the standards and schedules applicable to other governmental
services established by responsible authorities except when rules, regulations
or policies of the department specify limits or methods of computation that
require lower rates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
609.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
